query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Final report on relevant regulations and standards
result.description: Final report on relevant regulations and standards The new technologies and products that are being developed within WP5 of the INGREEN project will be assessed for their compliance with the relevant regulations and standards Task 61 This will involve a series of evaluations of the food safety and production requirements and identification of the potential risks and hazards These evaluations will establish whether external approvals are required To demonstrate that the products and processes meet the EU food safety and environmental protection requirements technical dossiers will be prepared with input from WP2WP5 They will include a description of the products or processes related documentation eg material specifications intended applications critical parameter andor risk analyses test results and evidence to demonstrate that the products comply with the relevant directives or regulations

result.title: Seminars, innovation workshops, conference participation, study tours
result.description: Seminars innovation workshops conference participation study toursD69 covers all outreach activities The purpose of D69 will be to provide detail of these activities and the outreach success Copies of the newsletters etc can be uploaded as one ZIP fileD611 is deleted and included in D69 so outcome of 69 and 610 is now put into one deliverable that deals with both quality and quantifiable results of dissemination inclOutreach of projectWho have been targeted and metLikely impactEffect of different medias usedNewsletters etc to be zipped and uploaded in one file end of project

result.title: Research Data Open Access
result.description: Research data which will made available for reuse at Slovenian Social Science Data Archives ADPThe data will include the transcriptions of all interviews with teachers local and migrant children experts and stakeholders survey questionnaire and SPSS data base It will also include description of research methodologyAt ADP the archived data will be ranged to three different categories according to the level of security and risk assessment 1 security data 2 scientific use data and 3 public use data Research data will be securely protected and anonymized before it will be made accessible and ready to be reused by public as Public use file

result.title: 1 Comparative report on research on migrant children in hotspots, asylum homes and detention centres
result.description: Comparative report on research on migrant children in hotspots asylum homes and detention centres will concern integration migrationrelated procedures judicial proceedings administrative appeals firstinstance examination of asylum applications as well as deportation expulsion and other lawenforcement procedures including procedures for the support of victims of exploitation and abuse Comparative report will also compile examples of good practices related to integrationrelated measures
